name: egao
description: A CSS library to create kaomoji.

scripts.build: npm run build:ts && npm run build:css
scripts.watch:css: onchange "src/main.css" "build/**/*.js" -- "postcss src/main.css -o dist/egao.css && cp dist/egao.css docs/egao.css && npm run export-docs-data"
scripts.dev: npm run build && concurrently "npx @11ty/eleventy --serve" "tsc --watch" "npm run watch:css"
